channel.title: 隐私 on 澜氏冬雪的Blog
channel.description: Recent content in 隐私 on 澜氏冬雪的Blog

item.title: Edward Snowden About Privacy
item.description: Arguing that you don’t care about the right to privacy because you have nothing to hide is no different than saying you don’t care about free speech because you have nothing to say. 因为你没有什么可隐瞒的而争辩说你不关心隐私权，这与说你因为无话可说而不关心言论自由没有什么不同。
